page.title: 02Grantham:Army Barracks.
page.content: The Barracks is situated along-side the A52 towards Boston.The Prince William Of Gloucester Barracks is one of the major depots of the Territorial Army,providing the headquarters of the Royal Corps of Transport T.A.The barracks also house the headquarters of the 54th Infantry Brigade. Meetings for the Army Cadet Forces are held there e.g. the Colsterworth Detachment 17/21st Lancers and Grantham Detachment attached to the Royal Corps of Transport.In 1914 an airfield was constructed on this site which remained in operation as a training airfield until the advent of jetplanes.Modern aircraft proved too heavy for the grass runways and today the airfield is now grassland.
